ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: If you're a grad student, you'll love it.
A great way to be introduced to contemporary Italian films. Definitely recommended!
This was the best course I have ever taken at Yale.
YES! Absolutely take this class. It is fantastic and a manageable amount of work.
I would recommend Italian 596 for any student interested in Italian cinema.
I would wholeheartedly recommend this class to any fellow student. I truly believe that this class enriched my academic experience and will make me a better scholar of Italian.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course was a great opportunity to discuss new Italian cinema, which consequently also contributed to my understanding of preceding classic Italian film.
This class really helped my professional development. I plan on continuing the research on some of the issues raised in the class in themonths to come.
